detail_desc: Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliqué.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles and a hook and loop tab around the ankles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ribbed yoga top in fast-drying jersey with long sleeves, a wrapover front and wide ties at the waist.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Double-breasted coat in soft fabric with wide shawl lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. One inner pocket, a tab at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Balconette bra in soft lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, narrow detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Knee-length skirt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather. High waist with belt loops and press-studs, a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and a slit at the front. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and zip down the front of the legs.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Elasticated fabric scrunchie.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in a modal and cotton blend with gathers on one shoulder and a draped front with a tie at the hem.
One-shoulder body in jersey crêpe with flounced trims at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed zip and button at the side, a welt back pocket, and tapered legs with a short slit at the hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in stretch denim made from a cotton blend. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and wide, ankle-length legs.
Shopper in transparent plastic with a trim, handles and shoulder strap in woven fabric. Depth 11 cm. Width 26 cm. Height 30 cm.
T-shirt in a modal and cotton blend with a round, slightly deeper neckline.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with decorative piping at the hems.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.
Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, a V-neck with a wide flounced trim, long puff sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tapered waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cigarette trousers in linen and viscose twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed, foldover polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in jersey crêpe with draping. Wrapover front with a deep V-neck, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
V-neck satin blouse with gathers at the shoulders, short flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves, and a mesh section at the back.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.

Cigarette trousers woven in a slightly stretchy viscose blend with a regular waist that has a decorative grosgrain bow at the front and wide elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and lightly padded tongue and top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
Sports bras in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh, and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.

Dungaree dress, top, a pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Dress with front pockets, fixed straps with a knot detail, and press-studs at the back. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut blouse in a textured weave with short, wide puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Vest tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and a decorative bow at the front.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit socks in a sturdy cotton blend.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.8 cm.
Jumper in a super-soft fine knit with a wrapover V-neck and a practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Wide, high-waisted trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a tie belt, zip fly and concealed button. Pleats at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and straight legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned crêpe weave with short flounced sleeves and elastication at the top and hem.
Trousers in an airy, patterned weave with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, long sleeves and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Pull-on trousers in a softly draping weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Ribbed shorts with a small appliqué at the top, an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, detachable shoulder tabs, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a pleat at the back of the hem. Lined.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
